ygData.subject: Re: Spell resistances.
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, this was a very big and very annoying problem for me as well.  The reason is that you just entered a new circle, so you are not as good with the new
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, this was a very big and very annoying problem for me as well. The
reason is that
you just entered a new circle, so you are not as good with the new spells as
with the
older ones. The best thing for you to do is to max out your spell skills by
repeatedly casting a cheap level 1 spell until you get your skills maxed.

Permafrost is great for levelling fast and making good money at your level.
Level 17-19 went by quickly for me, I spent pretty much the whole time in
PF.

-Eryx of Innoruuk



-----Original Message-----
From: eantravis@... <eantravis@...>
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, July 20, 1999 4:23 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Spell resistances.


>From: eantravis@...
>
>I recently hit level 16 with my enchanter, and got some great new spells
>like Chase the Moon, Sanity Warp, etc...but I have noticed a drastic
>increase in the frequency my spells are resisted. Green cons consistantly
>resist Sanity Warp, the same monsters that I killed with Chaotic Feedback
>when they were blue cons. I have begun using Tashan again (Ever since level
>10 or so, I stopped using it), and Tashan seems to help the situation. I
>just think it is strange that I am having such a problem with monsters
>resisting more powerful spells, when lesser spells seemed to work on them
>great at lower levels. For instance, wisps now con green, but often resist
>Sanity Warp. I was murdering wisps with Chaotic Feedback just two levels
>ago. Same thing is happening with monsters I am just now starting to fight
>alot, like crocs in the Oasis, undead in Unrest, and Borer and Scythe
>Beetles in the Karanas. I am at a loss. Anyone else experience this kind of
>thing?
>
>Can't wait for Tashani...
>
>
>Timn the Enchanter
>Erollisi Marr
>"There are some who call me . . . Timn?"
>
